title: Couple With Heart: Man, Man, Medium-Light Skin Tone
description: Represents a romantic couple composed of two men, both with medium-light skin tones. It signifies love, partnership, and equality for same-sex relationships.
apple_vendor_description: This depiction of a couple, rendered in Apple's signature medium-light skin tone, showcases two men standing side-by-side, their connection symbolized by a prominent, softly rounded heart floating between them.  The emoji features Apple's characteristic smooth gradients and realistic lighting, giving the figures a warm, inviting appearance and the heart a delightful, almost tangible quality.  On Apple devices, this emoji beautifully communicates love, partnership, and strong affection between two men, adding a personal and inclusive touch to digital conversations.
